item.title: NotebookLM updates Business to Plus with more audio, lets all users interact with AI hosts
item.description: Google releases a new paid version of NotebookLM to enterprises, teams and power users, and offers new interactions with its audio feature.

item.title: Gemini 2.0 Flash ushers in a new era of real-time multimodal AI
item.description: Google’s release of Gemini 2.0 Flash this week, offering users a way to interact live with video of their surroundings, has set the stage for what cou...

item.title: New LLM optimization technique slashes memory costs up to 75%
item.description: Universal Transformer Memory uses neural networks to determine which tokens in the LLM's context window are useful or redundant.

item.title: Microsoft’s smaller AI model beats the big guys: Meet Phi-4, the efficiency king
item.description: Microsoft’s new AI model, Phi-4, outperforms larger competitors like Google’s Gemini Pro with superior mathematical reasoning while using fewer resour...

item.title: ChatGPT gets screensharing and real-time video analysis, rivaling Gemini 2
item.description: OpenAI now lets users video chat with ChatGPT in advanced voice mode, and the chatbot will respond to real-time images.
